de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.update.util
Class UpdateHandler

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.update.util.UpdateHandler

public class UpdateHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to handle the update of topic map items. Class handles all operation which will be proceeded during the interpretation of a update-expression.

Author:
Sven Krosse
